Flow.interviewLabel: Assign AE of Record to Agency {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Assign AE of Record to Agency

fields.name: AEName1
fields.fieldText:
The following AE has been assigned as the AE of Record for this agency and the Lead Owner: {!SalesRep.FirstName} {!SalesRep.LastName}


Please click Next to finish flipping.

textTemplates.name: Body
textTemplates.text:
You have been assigned as the AE of record to the referral partner: {!RP.Name}
Link to Referral Partner: https://klaviyo.my.salesforce.com/{!RP.Id}

textTemplates.name: Subject
textTemplates.text: You have been Assigned as the AE of Record to {!RP.Name}

value.stringValue: A Fault Has Occured on a Flip to Sales Flow
via GIPHY
A New Lead Has Been Assigned To You
